name: maintenance-mode-wp
description: Shut down your site for a little while and do some maintenance on it!

scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Version %s.' package.json package-lock.json maintenance-mode.php README.md
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Version %s.' package.json package-lock.json maintenance-mode.php README.md
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Version %s.' package.json package-lock.json maintenance-mode.php README.md
